Flow.description: Added call fields and platform type

formulas.name: auto_forecast_method_description
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Subtype__c},"Renewal - Annual") && NOT({!recordId.HasOpportunityLineItem}), "Calculated based on Renewal Risk", "Controlled by RevOps order form" )

formulas.name: renewal_booking_channel
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Subtype__c},"Renewal - Annual") || ISPICKVAL({!recordId.Subtype__c},"Renewal - Bridge"), IF( {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c} = 0, "Churn", IF( {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c} > {!recordId.Renewal_Baseline_Annualized_Revenue__c}, "Expansion", IF( {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c} = {!recordId.Renewal_Baseline_Annualized_Revenue__c}, "Flat", IF( {!recordId.Forecast_Total_AR__c} < {!recordId.Renewal_Baseline_Annualized_Revenue__c}, "Contraction", "" ) ) ) ), "" )

Flow.label: Opportunity - Update Forecast

fields.name: Erorr_Not_found_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: This opportunity is in stage {!recordId.StageName}. You may not update the forecast for a closed opportunity.

fields.name: Erorr_Not_found_0
fields.fieldText: Error: Opportunity with ID [{!oppid}] is not a open renewal or qualified deal.

fields.name: Erorr_Not_found_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: Only the opportunity owner, the assigned RM or the owner's manager of may update the forecast

fields.name: Erorr_Not_found_0_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: Error: Invalid Forecast Approach. Let Jon know if you see this.

fields.name: Error
fields.fieldText:
Error: You cannot update the forecast on this opportunity right now


{!Get_global_permission.Reason__c}

fields.name: error_renewal_risk_r
fields.fieldText: Error: If you are forecasting a full churn you must also forecast Renewal Risk as either High Risk or Certain Churn.

fields.name: Error_header
fields.fieldText: Error: This deal currently is being updated by RevOps. Please try again in a few minutes.

fields.name: CC_header
fields.fieldText: You are forecasting this {!recordId.Subtype__c} as a {!renewal_booking_channel}. Please provide or confirm the following additional context:

fields.name: CC_header_0
fields.fieldText: You are forecasting this {!recordId.Subtype__c} deal as an Expansion. Please provide or confirm the following additional context:

fields.name: auto_forecast_not_available
fields.fieldText: Automatic forecasting not available for this deal

fields.name: Forecast_Total_NRR
fields.helpText: The Total NRR where you project the deal will close

fields.name: Forecast_Total_ARR
fields.helpText: The Total ARR where you project the deal will close

fields.name: Probability
fields.helpText: The % likelihood that you think the opportunity will successfully close

fields.name: Renewal_Risk
fields.helpText:
Expected to renew: We expect the customer to at least renew flat.

Low risk: 25% chance or less the customer will fully churn

Medium risk: 25-50% chance the customer will fully churn

High risk: 75%+ chance or less the customer will fully churn

Certain churn: 100% certainty the customer will churn.

fields.name: close_date
fields.helpText: The date when you think the opportunity is most likely to close.

validationRule.errorMessage: Close date must be today or in the future

fields.name: platform_type_flag
fields.fieldText: Set from RevOps quote or Business Unit

validationRule.errorMessage: Next step date must be today or in the future.

fields.name: error_pipe_freeze_warning
fields.fieldText: Warning: Pipeline updates frozen globally
